entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Wind east 20 km/h. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 6:51 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. High 18.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. Local amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High 18. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:51 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: A few showers ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Local amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 6:51 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
